column4: I use linux. My friend uses PC (crap) and we need to transfer a couple .exe's to his computer. How can I do that. My flash drive won't allow it
simple use the original cloud computing....email
ah ok and your usb thumbdrive wont work, maybe due to drivers again.

well if you have a LiveCD handy why not boot to the live disc, which will let you get on the net. then you can download the drivers etc from the website to the windows partiton, and then reboot the system and have access to them
